about_the_game:
Paradox Hr is a type of Program and Software and is not a game
It automatically generates codes and is unique.
Designed for Computer Users

Detailed information is included in the attachment.
The program records the passwords generated by the users and generates separate codes for each Computer User,
Since each computer user produces consecutive codes, the codes created by a different computer user do not match within the program.

name: Paradox Hr

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3-1125G4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R7 240
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio Driver
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 pro
  • Processor: i9-10850K
  • Graphics: Asus Radeon RX 550
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek HD Audio Driver
